subject: Question of strategy but ...
msgSnippet: I received my jar s from Sun for the Developper certification exam. After receiving it I start writting Unit tests to be able to monitor my changes step by
messageBody:
I received my jar's from Sun for the Developper certification exam.
After receiving it I start writting Unit tests to be able to monitor my
changes step by step.
I now have made a major change somewhere else in the code & know the
original test don't work anymore.

My question is more a general one :
Should I have restarted from scratch the writting the test of one & then
provide a new implementation
Or should I simply rewrite new TestCases ?

Here I haven't change much as I need to increase the functionnalitiesof an
existing application.
I therefore cannot rebuild from scratch... but what about a normal project ?

Has some one an interresting opinion on it ?

Tx,

Thomas,

--
Thomas SMETS
